dmca.title: Joanofquark.com Requests Takedown
dmca.body:
Google, Inc.
[private]
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Sirs:

	On 7/19103 we had notified www.microworks.com.sg that they had taken copy from our www.joanofquark.com/graphic.html page and www.joanofquark.com home page and illegally were using it on their www.microworks.com.sg/Print_design_contents.htm page. They have ignored our request and we asked that you remove their site from the directory should they not comply to any request that your company might make of them to do so.

	They are contactable at the following address: [private], [private]Building Singapore 328804. Tel: [private], Fax: [private] [private]@microworks.com.sg .

	I am also including herein a copy of the email sent to them, as well as samples of the copy from our page, written by myself and associate [private] along with the copy posted on their site.

	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner (our corporation), its agent, or the law.

	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Thank you for your help in this matter.

[private]
www.joanofqaurk.com
[private]
Los Angeles, CA 90292
[private]
[private]@joanofquark.com

cc: [private]
